robot.navigation

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.navigation.Odometer

  • public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps up-to-date information about the location and heading of the robot.
    Since:
    2013-11-03
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andreas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Odometer

        public Odometer(TwoWheeledRobot robo)
        Odometer constructor. Allows for the keeping of up-to-date information about the robot's current postion and heading
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - - The motor for the left wheel
        rightMotor - - The motor for the right wheel
        corrector - - The Odometry Correction being used

    • Method Detail

      • timedOut

        public void timedOut()

      • getPosition

        public static void getPosition(double[] position)
        Updates an array of the position and heading of the robot with the up-to-date information. Updates the parameter.
        Parameters:
        position - - Array of position and heading of the robot x:0 y:1 t:2

      • getTwoWheeledRobot

        public TwoWheeledRobot getTwoWheeledRobot()
        Returns the TwoWheeledRobot class used by the Odometer and Navigation classes
        Returns:
        TwoWheeledRobot robo

      • setPosition

        public static void setPosition(double[] position,
               boolean[] update)
        Updates the position and heading of the robot with the values contained in the 'position' parameter. Only updates the value if the corresponding index in 'update' is true.
        Parameters:
        position - - values containing the updated position and heading x:0 y:1 t:2
        update - - values of whether or not to update the respective value x:0 y:1 t:2
